wikipedia_page.main: Dum-Doodles (real name Kwam-Korsa-Acquah) is an English cartoonist, character designer and animator from Enfield, London. He went to the Rudolf Steiner School, Kings Langley, Hertfordshire. Dum-Doodles draws urban cartoons and has been commissioned by Bashy and Chris Brown. In 2013, Dum-Doodles worked with Warner Bros. Records English pop group Stooshe on the group's debut album London with the Lights On, cartooning the girls in the deluxe edition lyric poster and in their music video for their single "Slip" directed by Bryan Barber.
